dev/lsf/asio/address.hpp

00001 // File:        address.hpp
00002 // Description: ---
00003 // Notes:       ---
00004 // Author:      leoxiang <leoxiang727@qq.com>
00005 // Revision:    2012-06-07 by leoxiang
00006 
00007 #pragma once
00008 #include <arpa/inet.h>
00009 #include <string>
00010 #include <cstring>
00011 #include "lsf/asio/protocol.hpp"
00012 
00013 namespace lsf {
00014 namespace asio {
00015 
00017 // Address
00019 class Address {
00020 public:
00021     const static size_t MAX_ADDRESS_NAME = 128;
00022     using address_type = union {
00023         in_addr v4;
00024         in6_addr v6;
00025     };
00026     friend class SockAddr;
00027 
00028 public:
00030     // static function
00031     static Address Any(proto::Domain domain = proto::v4) { return Address(domain); }
00032     static Address Loopback(proto::Domain domain = proto::v4) { return domain == proto::v4 ? Address(AF_INET, "127.0.0.1") : Address(AF_INET6, "::1"); }
00033 
00035     // constructor
00036     Address(proto::Domain domain = proto::v4, std::string const& ip_str = "") : _domain(domain) {
00037         if (IsV4()) {
00038             if (!ip_str.empty())    inet_pton(AF_INET, ip_str.c_str(), &_address.v4);
00039             else                    inet_pton(AF_INET, "0.0.0.0", &_address.v4);
00040         } else {
00041             if (!ip_str.empty())    inet_pton(AF_INET6, ip_str.c_str(), &_address.v6);
00042             else                    inet_pton(AF_INET6, "::", &_address.v6);
00043         }
00044     }
00045 
00046     Address(std::string const& ip_str) : _domain(proto::v4) {
00047         if (inet_pton(AF_INET, ip_str.c_str(), &_address.v4) > 0) {
00048             _domain = proto::v4;
00049         }
00050         else if (inet_pton(AF_INET6, ip_str.c_str(), &_address.v6) > 0) {
00051             _domain = proto::v6;
00052         }
00053         else {
00054             *this = Any();
00055         }
00056     }
00057 
00058     Address(in_addr const& addr)  : _domain(proto::v4) { ::memcpy(&_address.v4, &addr, sizeof(_address.v4)); }
00059     Address(in6_addr const& addr) : _domain(proto::v6) { ::memcpy(&_address.v6, &addr, sizeof(_address.v6)); }
00060 
00062     // member function
00063     std::string ToString() const {
00064         char tmp[MAX_ADDRESS_NAME];
00065         if (IsV4()) return inet_ntop(AF_INET,  &_address.v4, tmp, sizeof(tmp));
00066         else        return inet_ntop(AF_INET6, &_address.v6, tmp, sizeof(tmp));
00067     }
00068 
00069     bool operator==(Address const& rhs) const {
00070         if (_domain != rhs._domain) return false;
00071         if (IsV4()) return ::memcmp(&_address.v4, &rhs._address.v4, sizeof(_address.v4)) == 0;
00072         else        return ::memcmp(&_address.v6, &rhs._address.v6, sizeof(_address.v4)) == 0;
00073     }
00074     bool operator!=(Address const& rhs) const { return !(*this == rhs); }
00075 
00076     bool IsV4() const { return _domain.IsV4(); }
00077     bool IsV6() const { return _domain.IsV6(); }
00078 
00079     proto::Domain domain() const { return _domain; }
00080 
00081     bool IsLoopback() const { return (IsV4() && ToString() == "127.0.0.1") || (IsV6() && ToString() == "::1"); }
00082     bool IsAny() const { return (IsV4() && ToString() == "0.0.0.0") || (IsV6() && ToString() == "::"); }
00083     bool IsPrivate() const {
00084         if (IsV6()) return false;
00085         uint32_t ip = ntohl(_address.v4.s_addr);
00086         return (ip >> 24) == 0xa ||
00087                (ip >> 20) == 0xac1 ||
00088                (ip >> 16) == 0xc0a8;
00089     }
00090 
00091 private:
00092     proto::Domain _domain;
00093     address_type _address;  // network byte order
00094 };
00095 
00096 }  // end of namespace asio
00097 }  // end of namespace lsf
00098
